org.apache.flink.mesos.runtime.clusterframework

接口 MesosResourceManagerActions


  • public interface MesosResourceManagerActions
    Actions defined by the MesosResourceManager.

    These are called by the MesosResourceManager components such as LaunchCoordinator, and TaskMonitor.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void acceptOffers(AcceptOffers offersToAccept)
      Accept the given offers as advised by the launch coordinator.
      void reconcile(ReconciliationCoordinator.Reconcile reconciliationRequest)
      Trigger reconciliation with the Mesos master.
      void taskTerminated(TaskMonitor.TaskTerminated terminatedTask)
      Notify that the given Mesos task has been terminated.

    • 方法详细资料

      • acceptOffers

        void acceptOffers(AcceptOffers offersToAccept)
        Accept the given offers as advised by the launch coordinator.

        Note: This method is a callback for the LaunchCoordinator.

        参数:
        offersToAccept - Offers to accept from Mesos

      • reconcile

        void reconcile(ReconciliationCoordinator.Reconcile reconciliationRequest)
        Trigger reconciliation with the Mesos master.

        Note: This method is a callback for the TaskMonitor.

        参数:
        reconciliationRequest - Message containing the tasks which shall be reconciled

      • taskTerminated

        void taskTerminated(TaskMonitor.TaskTerminated terminatedTask)
        Notify that the given Mesos task has been terminated.

        Note: This method is a callback for the TaskMonitor.

        参数:
        terminatedTask - Message containing the terminated task
